description: Finalize StrongPrompt website: (1) Connect top11 repo to strongprompt.ai domain; (2) Update content to serve financial services and healthcare verticals, not just banking; (3) Finalize last couple slides with case studies or market positioning
Implement PDF design for BFR retreat documentation: (1) Apply color and font changes per design spec; (2) Add vendor list section with contact info and services
Leverage MinerU OCR library to create MD document to help LLM understand the structure of the overall document and how a specific chunk or picture fits into the document

Create 'documents' table for lora_training: New table to replace/supplement 'reports'. Documents are tied to patient-provider relationships with specific types (op_notes, pre_op_consult, mri_report, face_sheet, protocol, etc.). Schema: document_id, patient_id, provider_id, document_type, source_format (digital/fax/scanned), document_date, created_at, document_metadata (key fields per type). Create corresponding 'document_chunks' table with heading_level, heading_text, heading_path, parent_chunk_id, bbox (from MinerU). Define document type taxonomy with purpose and structure. Integrate with task 33 (header/footer cleanup) and task 39 (MinerU structural context).

Evaluate header/footer removal strategy: Test unstructured.io for document structure comprehension (headers, footers, diagrams). Short patience—if not easy, pivot to MinerU (has vision model). Avoid maintaining both libraries. See prompt: task-33-header-footer.md

Migrate PT assistant (local + Railway) from uuid-ossp to native gen_random_uuid(). ✓ Complete: PG 17→18 upgraded locally and on Railway staging. Schema migrated, uuid-ossp removed, gen_random_uuid() in use.

Update pg dump skill with production-hardened guidance: (1) check ALL schema objects (tables, ENUMs, functions) before restore + DROP SCHEMA CASCADE if needed; (2) add pg_restore error handling (--clean --if-exists vs manual drop); (3) improve Railway CLI JSON extraction pattern; (4) add post-restore verification checklist (table counts, extensions, embeddings, sample query); (5) clarify extension auto-handling; (6) guide when to use direct pipe vs snapshot file

Implement LTP Roadmap Voting System: Domain-based authorization, 10 votes/month budget, vote reallocation, vote counts by item, admin domain management, voter/admin UI, FastAPI backend with transaction safety

Implement MinerU Structural Context: Add heading_level, heading_text, heading_path, parent_chunk_id, bbox columns to resource_chunk. Build heading hierarchy breadcrumbs. Map chunks to actual page_idx from MinerU JSON. Update ingestion pipeline (models, mineru_processor, chunker, database).

Engineer out manual OTP copy-paste from PWA login: Migrate from email to SMS for OTP delivery to enable native autofill on iOS/Android. Research shows SMS autofill (system-level) is more reliable than email copy-paste. See prompt: task-40-otp-autofill.md

Add kb query types beyond kb-check: kb-ask (direct questions about stakeholders), kb-recall (what did we discuss about X), kb-compare (compare stakeholder positions). Update kb SKILL.md with new subskills.
Insert Mailbox services (HIPAA-compliant document routing) into provider tables. Build new 'Mega Inbox' section of PRD covering mailbox vendor integration for clinic document ingestion.

Build Bawa demo database with time-travel capability: (1) Patient journey scrubber to jump forward/backward in recovery timeline (day 1, week 3, month 4); (2) Scenario templates - frozen knee, CPM non-compliance, normal recovery; (3) Let Bawa select patient types via UI to generate demo patients; (4) Use existing Bawa TKR protocol (PostOpTKAUPDATED_09112025_HSB.pdf already in pt_assistant_dev). Goal: show prevention AND recovery handling for each scenario.

Document medical terminology in PROJECT_CONTEXT.md: (1) Document types - op notes (operative report, post-surgery details), pre-op consult/H&P (history & physical, pre-surgery baseline), face sheet (patient demographics + insurance), protocol (doctor's recovery guidelines); (2) Key terms - TKR (total knee replacement), ROM (range of motion), CPM (continuous passive motion machine), frozen knee (stiffness/limited ROM), ICD-10 (diagnosis codes); (3) Data sources - clean digital vs faxed/OCR quality issues.
Voice architecture expansion: Deepgram TTS integration (POC/MVP) + Personaplex GPU research (BETA). See prompt: task-48-voice-architecture.md
Evaluate aiohttp vs httpx: research architectural differences, side-by-side performance testing, identify if migration is worthwhile across projects. See prompt: task-49-aiohttp.md

Get feedback on Sales Support application PRD draft v1 (warm_fusion project). Clarify three separate conversation streams: (1) DME front end sales requirements (sales team workflow), (2) Back end bill back operations (internal fulfillment), (3) Payers integration (insurance billing/routing). New project—set up on Mac Air.

Evaluate Okta as auth platform for lora_training: HIPAA-compliant identity management vs. custom SMS OTP. Research BAA support, cost, integration complexity, passkeys/WebAuthn support. Build vs. buy decision. See prompt: task-51-okta-evaluation.md

Harvest railway_staging_environment_setup.md: Extract reusable content to devops/staging skill or railway skill, consolidate project-specific details into lora_training_railway_cicd_runbook.md, then delete the original file
Build show-tasks CLI: uv run show
Consolidate Claude.md rules to global level. See prompt: task-54-global-claude-md.md
Merge clawbot_thoughts.md into HJ personality MVP doc. See prompt: task-57-clawbot-merge.md
Wire KB access from other project repos. Shell wrapper in ~/bin/kb that delegates to utilities venv. See prompt: task-56-kb-cross-repo.md

Bidirectional data flow diagram for Thursday meeting (Jan 30). Current diagram only covers order ingestion. Need to show post-ingestion lifecycle: back office pushes auth/fulfillment updates to mobile sales app via SSE + push notifications. Cover fulfillment decisioning (serialized asset, rep inventory, corporate drop ship, vendor drop ship), documentation requests (medical records, post-op reports for medical necessity), and task/notification system. Create straw man of mobile interface — keep it business-friendly, no field-level technical details. Stakeholders: Brett Varner, Jeff Salamon. See prompt: task-55-bidirectional-flow.md
Implement PWA home screen icon behavior and manifest setup for eye therapeutics. See prompt: task-58-pwa-home-screen-icons.md
Configure Claude Code to disable read permission requests for in-project files: Locate hooks config or settings file, disable permission prompts for file reads within project scope.

Check and standardize versioning logic for lora_training: Audit current version scheme, define semantic versioning strategy, establish version management pattern across backend and frontend, integrate with CI/CD release process.

Research value of LM Studio v1 REST API for local inference integration: Evaluate native /api/v1/* endpoints (chat, model load/unload/download, stateful chats, MCP via API, auth tokens). Compare native API vs OpenAI-compat mode features (stateful chat, remote MCPs, model load streaming, prompt processing events, context length per-request). Determine use cases for local model management and how it fits into existing infrastructure.

Voice pipeline smoke test: Clone and evaluate Pipecat (macos-local-voice-agents) and/or RealtimeVoiceChat for local voice-to-voice orchestration. Configure with validated models (Whisper Turbo STT, Kokoro 82M TTS, LM Studio LLM). Evaluate turn-taking, echo cancellation, interruption, latency. Update voice_ai_solutions_report_v3.md with results. See prompt: task-62-voice-smoke-test.md
